scripts.init: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ..
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run copy
scripts.build:full: npm run build && npm run build:docker
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run db:init && node server.js
scripts.start:docker: docker-compose down && npm run build:full && docker-compose up --force-recreate
scripts.db:start: docker container start boilerplate-with-react-mysql-sql-database && npm run db:info || docker run -d --name boilerplate-with-react-mysql-sql-database -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_USER=changethis -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=changethis -e MYSQL_DATABASE=changethis -p "3306:3306" mariadb:10.5.3 && npm run db:info
